name: natural_hazards
description: Disaster resilience, risk management, and climate adaptation planning

proposals.text: Remove all climate projections from hazard mitigation planning and mandate use of historical data only for emergency preparedness.
proposals.rationale: Actively prevents adaptation to changing climate risks by removing forward-looking assessments from emergency planning

proposals.text: Eliminate funding for climate-related disaster preparedness and restrict emergency planning to conventional hazards only.
proposals.rationale: Deliberately reduces community capacity to prepare for climate-intensified disasters

proposals.text: Prohibit inclusion of sea level rise projections in flood zone mapping and infrastructure planning.
proposals.rationale: Systematically ignores growing climate risks in critical planning processes

proposals.text: Mandate removal of climate change considerations from all emergency response protocols and training.
proposals.rationale: Enforces outdated emergency response approaches that ignore climate impacts

proposals.text: Cap disaster preparedness budgets at current levels with explicit exclusion of climate adaptation measures.
proposals.rationale: Actively limits resources for climate-resilient emergency management

proposals.text: Document extreme weather events without implementing any climate adaptation strategies.
proposals.rationale: Provides basic monitoring without preparedness improvements

proposals.text: Allow optional consideration of climate projections in non-critical infrastructure planning.
proposals.rationale: Permits but doesn't require climate-informed planning

proposals.text: Conduct basic climate vulnerability assessments with voluntary adaptation guidelines.
proposals.rationale: Creates awareness of climate risks without requiring action

proposals.text: Install flood monitoring systems in major waterways without adaptation planning.
proposals.rationale: Provides basic risk monitoring without systematic response

proposals.text: Consider both historical data and climate projections equally in hazard planning.
proposals.rationale: Balances traditional and forward-looking risk assessment

proposals.text: Maintain current emergency response capabilities with equal attention to all hazard types.
proposals.rationale: Takes neutral approach to climate vs conventional risks

proposals.text: Create public dashboard showing real-time natural hazard risks and climate indicators.
proposals.rationale: Promotes transparency and awareness of evolving risks

proposals.text: Offer 30% matching funds for private property climate resilience improvements.
proposals.rationale: Provides meaningful incentives for adaptation measures

proposals.text: Require all critical infrastructure upgrades to incorporate 2050 climate projections.
proposals.rationale: Sets mandatory but achievable climate resilience standards

proposals.text: Implement comprehensive flood early warning system with automated alerts and evacuation protocols.
proposals.rationale: Creates robust systems for climate-related emergency response

proposals.text: Mandate climate risk assessments and adaptation plans for all municipal capital projects.
proposals.rationale: Strong requirements for climate-resilient infrastructure

proposals.text: Create resilience zones requiring all new development to withstand category 5 hurricanes and 500-year floods.
proposals.rationale: Major investment in climate-resilient infrastructure

proposals.text: Establish integrated climate resilience system combining natural infrastructure, early warning, and adaptive management.
proposals.rationale: Comprehensive transformation of risk management

proposals.text: Require all neighborhoods to achieve specific resilience metrics for heat, flooding, and storm impacts.
proposals.rationale: Transformative approach to community-wide resilience

proposals.text: Create climate-resilient infrastructure network with redundant systems and adaptive capacity for 2100 projections.
proposals.rationale: Near-complete transformation to future-proof systems

proposals.text: Mandate comprehensive climate resilience achieving protection against all projected 2100 hazards through integrated infrastructure, natural systems, and community preparation by 2026.
proposals.rationale: Complete transformation to climate-resilient city systems
